title: So what's Riot doing?
body:
So 4 years what's riot doing about players like those?

In game he even said he has been banned twice before and he doesn't care

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/70062431/200867457?tab=overview

replies.body: Just dodge, it lowers your LP but not your MMR.
Although it might suck, your best bet can be to go into the game, play it through and report him for intentionally feeding.

That's what I do lol. 

Kinda wish there's a pre-game report function thou :x
Riot can't stop every toxic player in LoL, might mute him or just dodge the queue.
